data.title: Rush Munster: Premier Medical Center in Munster, IN
data.meta_description: Discover unparalleled care at Rush Munster, a leading medical center in Indiana. Click to learn more about our advanced healthcare services and schedule your visit today.
data.text:
Hours & Address

9200 Calumet Ave, Suite E107

Munster, IN 46321

Get Directions

Hours:

Mon: 8:00 am – 5:00 pm

Tue: 7:00 am – 5:00 pm

Wed: 8:00 am – 5:00 pm

Thu: 8:00 am – 7:00 pm

Fri: 8:00 am – 5:00 pm

Sat: 8:00 am – 12:00 pm

Sun: Closed

About Rush Munster

Rush Munster, opened in early 2023, is an outpatient medical facility that brings health care closer to home for patients in Northwest Indiana. Most of our providers are affiliated with Rush University Medical Center in Chicago, which U.S. News & World Report includes on its Best Hospitals Honor Roll. That means you can find high-quality care locally — without the challenge of traveling.

Multiple specialties, one location: Rush Munster offers access to top health care providers in primary care and several specialties.

Comprehensive on-site services: We have 19 patient rooms and offer services for imaging, stress echocardiograms and ultrasounds. X-rays are available for walk-in patients.

Increased options for care: Since opening, our location has added to existing care options from Rush in Northwest Indiana, including cardiology services and thoracic surgery through the Franciscan Health hospitals.

Online access to your records: Rush patients have access to MyChart, an electronic system you can log onto with your smartphone, computer or other device. It gives you direct access to your own medical records, including test results and immunization records. And you can use it to schedule appointments or send secure messages directly to your care providers.

Rush University Medical Center Ranked Among the Best in the U.S.

Learn More

RUSH Munster Doctors & Providers

Bariatric Surgery

Bariatric Surgery Providers

Comprehensive care for people considering weight loss surgery. Learn more about bariatric surgery services at RUSH.

Cancer Surgery

Cancer Surgery Providers

Complex General Surgical Oncology, Surgery

Steven Gitelis, MD

Orthopaedic Surgery

Personalized care and consultation for people who need cancer surgery. Learn more about cancer care at Rush.

Cardiology

Cardiology Providers

Interventional Cardiology, Cardiovascular Disease

Henry Huang, MD

Clinical Cardiac Electrophysiology, Cardiovascular Disease

Hussam Suradi, MD

Interventional Cardiology, Cardiovascular Disease, Adult Congenital Heart Disease

Cardiac care for the full range of cardiovascular diseases, including arrhythmias, coronary artery disease and more. Learn more about cardiac care at RUSH.

Colorectal Surgery

Colorectal Surgery Providers

John Konen, MD

Colon and Rectal Surgery, Surgery

Specialized surgical care for colorectal conditions, such as colon cancer, hemorrhoids, Crohn's disease and more. Learn more about colorectal surgery services at RUSH.

Ear, Nose and Throat

Ear, Nose and Throat Providers

Samer Al-Khudari, MD

Otolaryngology - Head and Neck Surgery

Peter Papagiannopoulos, MD

Otolaryngology - Head and Neck Surgery

Bobby Tajudeen, MD

Otolaryngology - Head and Neck Surgery

Expert care for ear, nose and throat conditions, including sinus conditions, sleep apnea surgery, voice and swallowing disorders and more. Learn more about ENT services at RUSH.

Hepatology

Hepatology Providers

Steven Flamm, MD

Transplant Hepatology, Gastroenterology

Kristy Kiermaier, NP, DNP

Family Nurse Practitioner

Advanced care for people with all forms of liver disease, including hepatitis and cirrhosis, as well as for those who need a liver transplant. Learn more about hepatology care at RUSH.

Neuro-Oncology

Neuro-Oncology Providers

Stephan Munich, MD

Neurological Surgery

Specialized care for tumors found in the central nervous system, including brain tumors. Lean more about neuro-oncology at RUSH.

Pediatric General Surgery

Pediatric General Surgery Providers

Brian Gulack, MD

Pediatric Surgery

Srikumar Pillai, MD

Pediatric Surgery

Advanced surgical methods and care tailored to each child. Learn more about pediatric general surgery at RUSH.

Appointments for these providers will be available soon.

Pediatric Urology

Pediatric Urology Providers

Jonathan Ross, MD

Pediatric Urology

A full range of care for urological conditions, from bed-wetting and recurrent bladder infections to congenital abnormalities and urinary tract blockages. Learn more about pediatric urology care at RUSH.

Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery

Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery Providers

Mamtha Raj, MD

Plastic Surgery

Specialized surgical consultation and care for a wide range of physical conditions and cosmetic enhancements. Learn more about plastic surgery services at RUSH.

Appointments for these providers will be available soon.

Primary Care

Primary Care Providers

Tonja Austin, MD

Family Medicine (General Medicine)

Tamer Mustafa, DO, MS

Family Medicine (General Medicine)

Personalized primary care for overall wellness and disease prevention, as well as care for common and complex conditions. Learn more about primary care at RUSH.

Weight Loss and Lifestyle Medicine

Weight Loss and Lifestyle Medicine Providers

Antoinette Murphy, NP

Family Nurse Practitioner

A variety of treatment options, including nutrition counseling, personal training, health coaching and monitoring, and weight-loss surgery. Learn more about weight loss services at RUSH.

Scheduling an Appointment at Rush Munster

To schedule an appointment at Rush Munster, you can call (219) 806-6585. A care coordinator will help you and answer any questions you may have.

You can also walk into the building and request an appointment in person during our regular hours of operation.

Returning patients have the option of using MyChart to schedule appointments, as well.

To learn more, you can visit our page on scheduling appointments at RUSH.

Rush Munster Parking and Transportation

Parking is available in front of the building, and parking spots for people with disabilities are near the front door.

If you enter Rush Munster’s address into your GPS, you may still have some difficulty finding the building. A few businesses, including Midwest Orthopaedics at Rush, share the street address of 9200 Calumet Ave. But the Rush location you’re looking for is at Suite E107.

If you have trouble getting to the parking lot, there are a few landmarks that may help you. From the corner of Calumet Avenue and Fran-lin Parkway, turn west onto the side street. You should see a Pepsi building ahead to the left. Turn right at the cross street. You’ll see a Noodles & Company and a BIBIBOP on your right. Rush will be ahead on the left and has a large RUSH sign at the top of the building.

Rush Munster often sees patients from the surrounding areas. Following are directions from some of the most common places our visitors travel from:

Lansing, Illinois: Head east on Ridge Road. Turn right onto Calumet Avenue. In about a mile, turn right onto Braden Way. Take a left, and Rush Munster will be on your right.

Hammond, Indiana: Head south on Calumet Avenue. Turn right onto Braden Way. Take a left, and Rush Munster will be on your right.

Calumet City, Illinois: Head south on Wentworth Avenue toward Munster. Turn left on Ridge Road. In about a mile, turn right on Calumet Avenue. In about another mile, turn right onto Braden Way. Take a left, and Rush Munster will be on your right.

Dyer, Indiana: Head north on Calumet Avenue. When you get to Fran-lin Parkway, turn left onto the side street. Turn right at the cross street, and Rush Munster will be ahead on the left.

Rush Oak Brook: Turn left on York Road, then left on East Ogden Avenue. Merge onto I-294 South toward Indiana. Stay on I-294 South, then continue onto I-80 East. Take Exit 1 and turn right to head south on Calumet Avenue. In about a mile and a half, turn right onto Braden Way. Take a left, and Rush Munster will be on your right.

FAQs About Rush Munster

Will Rush Munster take my insurance?

If you have questions about which health care locations and providers will accept your insurance, it is best to reach out to your insurance company directly. They will be able to offer more specific information about your plan.

You may find answers to some of your questions on our insurance page.

Do I have to drive to Chicago or another Rush location for surgery?

Rush Munster is an outpatient facility, which means you will need to travel to another location for surgical procedures. But we offer much of the testing, preparation and follow-up care that you’ll need before and after surgery on site.

Does Rush Munster accept Indiana public aid?

Our surgical specialties accept Indiana public aid.
